Class NS_Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObjects.GameObject
      • gameObjects.VisibleGameObject
        • gameObjects.NetworkedObject
          • gameObjects.NS_Base
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NS_Asteroid, NS_Boss, NS_Drone, NS_Fighter, NS_Player

    public class NS_Base
extends NetworkedObject
    The base for all networked ships
    Author:
    aschmid
